collections.appName=Collections collections.home.create=Create collections.home.create.hint=Create a new collection: collections.home.create.name=Name collections.home.create.name.hint=The name of the new collection. A document with the specified name will be created to store the collection. collections.home.create.type=Type collections.home.create.type.hint=The type of collection. collections.home.type.static=Static (a static list of documents) collections.home.type.query=Query (the list of documents returned by a database query) collections.home.type.link=Link (the list of documents reachable through wiki links from a given document) collections.home.type.hierarchy=Hierarchy (the list of children, grandchildren, .., of a given document)
collections.livetable.doc.name=Name collections.livetable.type=Type collections.livetable.doc.author=Author collections.livetable.doc.date=Date collections.livetable._actions=Actions
collections.static.pages.hint=The wiki pages included in this collection.
collections.query.type.hint=The query language used. collections.query.statement.name=Query collections.query.statement.hint=The query statement.
collections.link.root.hint=The name of the document to start from.
collections.hierarchy.root.hint=The name of the document to start from.
